email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out from Maritime Trade Services to offer a shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama.

We have the vessel SEA HORIZON available for this route, with a DWT of 80,000 and LOA of 220m. The initial freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT on CIF terms. The laycan is set for October 10th to October 15th.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 24.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Robert Lee
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10th to October 15th. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Robert Lee
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on October 10th, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Robert Lee
Charterers Inc.
